helpgrid.innerhtml: To add a site that is authorized to use this contract use New Row and add an individual site or use Select Sites to select multiple sites simultaneously. If required, modify the default Company and Bill To information for each authorized site. Click OK to authorize the specified sites and return to the contract.

To associate an SLA with this contract use the New Row button to add an individual SLA or use the Select SLAs button to select multiple SLAs simultaneously. Click OK to associate the specified SLAs and return to the contract.
Enter a description for the revised contract. Click OK when finished.
